DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test program design increase African American Hispanic American woman 's scientific literacy , knowledge clinical trial , facilitate breast cancer clinical trial participation .
DOC.detailed_description: Knowledge participation clinical trial disproportionately low among minority . The purpose study test program design increase African American Hispanic American woman 's scientific literacy , knowledge clinical trial , facilitate breast cancer clinical trial participation . A validation study also conduct validate several measure Hispanic American African American population . The experimental group watch education program concern breast cancer clinical trial control group watch education program neighborhood safety . To examine willingness participate research assess post-intervention invitation complete sleep diary .
DOC.criteria: SelfIdentified African American Hispanic American female Speak English and/or Spanish Mentally Physically capable complete consent process
